author: Rotten Tomatoes Trailers
description:
Stars Tom Blyth and Emily Bader, Director Brett Haley, and Author Emily Henry sat down with Rotten Tomatoes correspondent Natasha Martinez to talk about bringing the book characters to life, filming the Paula Abdul dance scene, the lengthy process of getting the movie greenlit, and the surprise of shooting on a nude beach to recreate the iconic book cover.
